name: Strange Sickness
description: Scotland, 1498. Robert Collison, a young member of Aberdeen's Town Council, faces a terrifying, exciting challenge when a deadly plague threatens his community. Guide his choices as he investigates the plague and develops strategies to fight it. Where will his actions lead him, and what impact will the plague, and the measures Robert offers to fight it, have on Aberdeen? Find out more about the game and how we made it at strangesickness.com
